events.title: Lunch
receive: Thank you for inviting me out! It surprised me that you were so good at coding... You were worried if I was disappointed while crying and coding for COGS 120 project, but I was actually very happy, even my tears knew that! Thank you again!

events.title: Bowling
events.receive: Thank you for inviting me out! It surprised me that you were so good at bowling... I also love your jokes about bowwwwling lol (although I didn't quite get it at the moment, my thinking is slow). You were worried if I was disappointed due to my poor bowling skill, but I was actually very happy! Thank you again!
